name: Sunkern
flavorText:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

previous.name: Aipom
previous.flavorText:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

next.name: Sunflora
next.flavorText:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.
